statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-6 \, x^{3} - 8 \, x^{2} + 9 \, x - 11 , -6 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - x + 1 , 2 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 2 , -x^{3} - x - 3 , -2 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
